document_data.name: Giggle
document_data.refs1e: {{Cite dragon/60/More Cantrips: Mini-spells for apprentice magic-users|17}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Giggle''''' was a person-affecting [[cantrip]] that beginning [[wizard]]s could learn.{{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|6}} It caused a target creature to suffer a brief fit of laughter.
document_data.Effects: This cantrip had a range of {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} and could target a single person or creature. If the target did not resist the spell, then it broke out in laughter for a period of two to three seconds before they could recover. If the spell was resisted, only a momentary chuckle ensued.
document_data.Components: This cantrip required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast. The caster wiggled a finger rapidly back and forth while uttering a word or phrase.The verbal component of this cantrip was known as a "punch line".
